text:
Hey <@U0260V1BX> and <@U0260V4K1> ! The Koru client is asking about whether we want them to come back down the week of the 20th?
- If so, we were thinking the 20th - 23rd, or something of that nature?
- Also, do you have a sense for which team members are going to be most helpful for this second trip? We're trying to figure out if all three of us need to do.
Looks like they're still on for the 15th and 16th, is that right? What are your thoughts on a visit the following week?
Yes - they're scheduled for the 15th and 16th right now
As for the week of the 20th, the way we left it with them was that wouldn't try to forecast out that far because we don't know now where we'll be then.
The place we landed was that we'd plan the next trip when they were down on the 15th
I think that plan is probably the only rational one, but I had to choose now, I'd say sure, come back down.

As for who should come down on the 15th, I'd say justin and Anne for sure. They also mentioned a woman who was sort of the keeper of the brand voice (@melissa do you remember her name?) - she would be good too
and i agree w justin's thoughts (sorry, was away from my desk)
